abstract.t: This document is an interim report into pre-emption in MPLS systems.At the 58th IETF, the MPLS Working Group determined that there areseveral interpretations of how pre-emption should be achieved withinMPLS systems. This document is the result of the initial enquiries tovendors and other implementors into the question of how and why theyoffer pre-emption funtion in their MPLS inplementations.This document is intended to be a short-lived document and onlyexists to document the current findings. It will be superceded orretired.
